metadata.Title: CVE-2021-46040 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A Pointer Dereference Vulnerabilty exists in GPAC 1.0.1 via the finplace_shift_moov_meta_offsets function, which causes a Denial of Servie (context-dependent).

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
